Reflexive Shot.abilityDesc: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to gain Evasion Up for 2 turns.  Target Lock: Grant another random ally Evasion Up for 2 turns.

Shut Down.abilityDesc: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and dispel all buffs on them.  This ability's cooldown is reset whenever an enemy reinforces.

Turnabout.abilityDesc: If Ashoka Tano's Jedi Starfighter doesn't have any buffs, it gains Offense Up for 2 turns and 25% turn meter.  Otherwise, it loses all status effects to recover 80% protection.

Hit The Mark.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to the target enemy and inflict Target Lock for 2 turns on a critical hit.

Daring Assault.abilityDesc: Bigg's X-wing recovers 35% protection and taunts for 1 turn whenever an enemy becomes Target Locked.

Academy Maneuver.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy and inflict Offense Down for 2 turns.  Target Lock: Call an ally to assist.

Opening Move.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy.  If Bistan's U-wing is stealthed, this attack can't be evaded and ignores the target's defense.  Target Lock: Inflict Tenacity Down for 2 turns.

Tactical Comms.abilityDesc: Whenever an ally scores a finishing blow, that ally gains 19% turn meter.  If that ally is a Rebel, Bistan's U-wing also gains that much turn meter.

Scouting Mission.abilityDesc: Inflict Target Lock on target enemy for 2 turns.  This effect can't be resisted.  Bistan's U-wing gains stealth for 2 turns, with a 50% chance to also gain 35% turn meter.

Assault Plan.abilityDesc: Bistan's U-wing has +20% speed.  In addition, whenever an enemy becomes Target Locked, another random ally gains 30% turn meter and advantage for 1 turn.

Trailblazer.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to the target enemy.  Target Lock: Cassian's U-wing gains 25% turn meter.

Avoid Contact.abilityDesc: All allies have +25% critical avoidance and +6% evasion when attacked by Target Locked enemies.  These bonuses are doubled for Rebel allies.

Guerilla Strike.abilityDesc: Deal special damage to target enemy and call target ally to assist.  Both attackers have an additional 20% critical damage.

Infiltration Tactics.abilityDesc: Dispel all debuffs on target ally and grant then stealth for 2 turns.  If that ally is a Rebel, also grant them 20% turn meter.

Threat Assessment.abilityDesc: Inflict Target Lock and Tenacity Down for 2 turns on target enemy.  These effects can't be resisted.  If the target enemy has any buffs, remove 20% turn meter.

Calculated Strike.abilityDesc: Target ally is called to Assist with +35% Offense.

Art of War.abilityDesc: All allies recover 20% Health and gain a buff for 2 turns. - Attacker: Offense Up - Support: Foresight - Tank: Defense Up Inflict a debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. These effects can't be Evaded. - Attacker: Offense Down - Support: Ability Block - Tank: Defense Down

Phylon 07 Tractor Beam Projectors.abilityDesc: Deal Special damage to all enemies and remove 20% Turn Meter.

Fierce Loyalty.abilityDesc: All allies have +25% Critical Damage (doubled on Empire allies) and +15% Critical Chance. When an enemy is defeated, all allies gain 5% Tenacity (stacking) until the end of battle. Reinforcement Bonus: Critical Chance Up for 2 turns.

Strategic Dominance.abilityDesc: Instantly defeat target enemy and deal damage to all remaining enemies equal to 40% of their Max Health. Dispel all debuffs on target ally and grant them 100% Health, 100% Protection and 75% Turn Meter, and heal all other allies equal to 40% of their Max Health. Increase all cooldowns on the enemy Capital Ship by 1. This ability starts on cooldown.

Wing Cannons.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance to inflicy Target Lock for 2 turns.

Overcharge.abilityDesc: Clone Sergeant's ARC-170 gains Offense Up for 2 turns and recovers 48% protection.

Torpedo Strike.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy.  Target Lock: This attack is an automatic critical hit and can't be evaded.

Strike True.abilityDesc: Deal phsyical damage to target enemy and inflict Target Lock for 2 turns.

Hold Fast.abilityDesc: Target ally recovers 48% protection, taunts and gains critical hit immunity for 2 turns.

Fortune Favors The Bold.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy and all enemies affected by Target Lock, then grant all allies Valor for 2 turns.  This abilitiy's cooldown is reduced by 1 for each enemy struck. (Valor:  Grant the Endurance 20% turn meter and reduce its ultimate ability's cooldown by 1 at end of turn.)

Honor and Might.abilityDesc: Allies with less than full health have +18% offense.  This bonus is doubled for Republic allies.  Reinforcement Bonus:  Reinforcements gain Valor for 2 turns.  (Valor:  Grant the Endurance 20% turn meter and reduce its ultimate ability's cooldown by 1 at end of turn.)

Convergence.abilityDesc: Each ally gains damage immunity and Offense Up for 1 turn.  This ability starts on cooldown.

Turbolaser Batteries.abilityDesc: Deal phsyical damage to target enemy and expose them for 2 turns.

Executive Order.abilityDesc: All allies gain 40% turn meter and Offense Up for 1 turn.  Empire allies also gain Potency Up for 1 turn.  This ability starts on cooldown.

Heavy Ion Canon.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to all enemies with a 55% chance to inflicy Ability Block for 1 turn.  This attack deal 35% more damage to debuffed enemies.

Imperial Assault.abilityDesc: Deal phsyical damage 12 times to random enemy targets.  These attacks can't be evaded.  Target Locked enemies are also stunned for 1 turn.  This ability starts on cooldown.

Victory At All Costs.abilityDesc: Allies deal 15% more damage for each debuffed enemy.  This bonus is doubled for Empire allies.  Reinforcement Bonus: Reinforcements gain retribution for 3 turns.

L-s9.6 Laser Cannons.abilityDesc: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. If this attack scores a Critical Hit, inflict Target Lock for 2 turns. This attack has +10% Critical Chance.

Double Offensive.abilityDesc: Deal Physical damage to all enemies with a 35% chance to remove 20% Turn Meter. Target Lock: Turn Meter removal is doubled and can't be Resisted.

Concussion Missile.abilityDesc: Deal Special damage to target enemy, inflict Ability Block for 1 turn, gain 20% Turn Meter, and call a random ally to assist. If that ally is First Order, grant them Advantage for 2 turns. This attack ignores Protection.

Target Acquired.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage with a 45% chance to attack again.  Each hit has a 55% chance to inflict Target Lock for 2 turns.

Relentless Pursuit.abilityDesc: First Order TIE Fighter gains 16.5% turn meter whenever a Target Locked enemy is damaged by an attack.

Strafe.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy.  Target Lock: Strafe's cooldown is refreshed.

Gauntlet Assault.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy.  Target Lock: Grant another random ally 20% turn meter.

Superior Maneuverability.abilityDesc: Gauntlet Starfighter has +20 speed and gains an additional +5 speed for each other active Empire ally.  Additionally, it grants +20% defense to all allies, doubled for Empire allies.

Reinvigorate.abilityDesc: Dispel all debuffs on all allies and grant them Protection Up (20%) for 2 turns.  Doubled for Empire allies.

Proton Missle Launcher.abilityDesc: Deal pysical damage to target enemy and inflict Buff Immunity for 2 turns.

Front Line.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy and remove 15% turn meter.  If the target is buffed, the turn meter removal is doubled.

Swarm Aggression.abilityDesc: Genosian Soldier's Starfighter has 25% chance to assist dealing 45% less damage whenever an allay attacks during their turn.  This chance is doubled for Separatist allies.

Separatist Assault.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy and call a random ally to assist.  Inflict Evasion Down for 2 turns if chosen ally is Separtist.  Target Lock: Both attackers deal 25% more damage.

Undermine.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy.  This attack deals more damage to buffed enemies.

Clandestine Operations.abilityDesc: Genosian Spy's Starfighter has +35% critical damage while stealthed.  In addition, whenever it takes damage, it has 20% chance to gain stealth for 1 turn.

Surprise Shot.abilityDesc: Deap special damage to target enemy and inflict Defense Down for 2 turns.  Target Lock: Call all stealthed allies to assist.

MS-2B Twin Laser Canon.abilityDesc: Deal phsyical damage to target enemy.  If the Ghost is stealthed this attack is guaranteed to be a critical hit.

Sensor Scrambler.abilityDesc: All enemies have -20 Potency and suffer Speed Down for 2 turns whenver the debuffs are resisted.  Additionally, while Phantom II is present the Ghost cannot be Target Locked.

Static Jammer.abilityDesc: The Ghost and target ally gain stealth for 2 turns.  Then call target's ally to assist and 2 buffed Rebel allies to assist (if able) dealing 50% less damage.

Attack All Angels.abilityDesc: Deal phsyical damage to all enemies and deal 30% bonus damage to each stealthed Rebel ally.  Target Lock: Inflict Ability Block for 1 turn.

Take 'em Down'.abilityDesc: Inflict Defense Down to target enemy for 2 turns and expose all Target Locked enemies.  These effects can't be resisted.  The Ghost gains 20% turn meter for each enemy that was exposed.

Mon Cal Cannons.abilityDesc: Deal phsyical damage to target enemy and call a random ally to assist.

Sieze the Advantage.abilityDesc: Dispel debuffs on target ally.  That ally recovers 35% health and 35% protection and other allies gain advantage for 2 turns.

Defiant Volley.abilityDesc: Deal special damage to all enemies and call up to two buffed allies to assist.

Master Plan.abilityDesc: All allies gain 30% turn meter and the Master Plan buff for 1 turn.  Master Plan: After this unit uses an ability during it's turn their cooldowns are reset and they gain 100% turn meter.  This ability starts on cooldown.

Band Together'.abilityDesc: Whenever an ally attacks out of turn they have +40% Critical Damage and gain Protection Up for (25%) for 2 turns.  These bonuses are doubled for Rebel allies.  Reinforcement Bonus: Reinforcements gain advantage for 1 turn.

L-S1 Laser Canon.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to inflict Target Lock for 2 turns.

T-S8 Targeting Computer.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy and gain Foresight for 2 turns.  Target Lock:  Inflict buff immunity for 2 turns.

Control Thrusters.abilityDesc: Grants 15% turn meter to the allied Capital Ship whenever this ship evades an attack.  The effect is doubled for Empire Capital ships.

Defensive Fire.abilityDesc: Deal phsyical damage to target enemy and gain Protection Up (30%) for 2 turns.

Advanced Jamming Array.abilityDesc: Dispel all buffs on target enemy with a 55% chance each to remove 30% turn meter and inflict Healing Immunity for 2 turns.

Surprise Raid.abilityDesc: Target ally gains 100% turn meter, Advantage for 1 turn and their cooldowns are reduced by 1, but they lose 25% protection.

Stirke Team.abilityDesc: Target ally loses all turn meter then all other allies gain 23% turn meter plus 25% of the turn meter that ally lost (doubled for First Order allies.)  If Kylo Ren's Command Shuttle targets itself, First Order allies gain Advantage for 2 turns.

Zeal of the First Order.abilityDesc: Kylo Ren's Command Shuttle has +30 Speed while it has Protection and +30% counter chance while it doesn't.  If First Order Tie Fighter is present, it receives 25% turn meter every time the Command Shuttle takes damage.

Quad Laser.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy with a 65% chance to hit them a second time, plus an additonal hit if Millenium Falcon (EP VII) is buffed.  Hits after the first deal 75% less damage.  Target Lock: This attack scores an additional hit.

Against the Odds.abilityDesc: Millenium Falcon (EP VII) gains 9% turn meter and 3% offense (stacking) whenever it is attacked.  If it is buffed when it is attacked, it also inflicts Target Lock on the attacker.

Thrust Reversal.abilityDesc: Millenium Falcom (EP VII) recovers 50% protection and gains 3 stacks of the Thrust Reversal unique buff.  Thrust Reversal: +4% Evasion per stack, 1 stack lost on taking damage; at end of turn, 1 stack is consumed to gain 100% turn meter.

Gambit.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to all enemies then lose all buffs.  This attack hits each enemy again for each buff lost this way (maximum 3.)  Hits after the first deal 50% less damage.

Slip Away.abilityDesc: Deal phsyical damage to target enemy with a 75% chance to gain stealth for 2 turns.

Distraction Tactics.abilityDesc: Phantom II gains 5% evasion for each active Rebel ally.  Additionally, any time the Ghost received a debuff or is critically hit.  Phanton II gains Foresight and Taunt until the next time it evades.

Sights Locked.abilityDesc: Inflict Target Lock on the target enemy for 2 turns with a 50% chance to also inflict Target Lock on another random enemy.

Maximum Power.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to grant all allies Critical Chance Up for 2 turns.

Multipurpose C1-10P Droid.abilityDesc: While Phantom II has no protection it has 50% chance each to gain Advantage, Foresight, Offsense Up, or Defense Up for 2 turns at the end of its turn.  While the Phantom II is active, the Ghost also has this ability.

Coordinated Assault.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to gain Speed Up.  Target Lock: Grant another random ally Speed Up for 2 turns.

Wings of the Republic.abilityDesc: Target ally Taunts for 2 turns.  If that ally is Republic, dispel all debuffs on them and grant them Protection Up (65%) for 2 turns.

Inspiring Charge.abilityDesc: All allies gain 40% Turn Meter, Clone allies gain Tenacity Up for 1 turn and Jedi allies gain Protection Recharge (35%) for 2 turns.

Cover All Angles.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy.  Target Lock: Daze the target for 2 turns.

Bolt From The Blue.abilityDesc: Poe's X-Wing gains Offense Up and Foresight for 3 turns, as well as, 46% turn meter and 35% Protection.

Perfect Shot.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy.  This attack can't be evaded and always scores a Critical Hit against enemies without protection.

Hot Pursuit.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy.  Target Lock: Expose the target for 2 turns.

Dissarray.abilityDesc: Daze target enemy for 2 turns and remove 31% turn meter with a 35% chance to apply these effects to a second target.

I'm On It.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to the target enemy and inflict Target Lock for 2 turns, with a 55% chance to also Expose them for 2 turns.

Hair Trigger.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy and inflict Target Lock for 2 turns if they have no buffs or debuffs; otherwise remove 10% turn meter.

Ready And Able.abilityDesc: Republic allies have +10% tenacity.  Whenever an ally resists and effect, all other allies recover 19% protection.

Republic Coordination.abilityDesc: Rex's ARC-170 and another target ally gain 50% turn meter and recover 50% protection.  This ability's cooldown is reduced by 1 for each other Republic ally.

Dread Cannons.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy. If the Scimitar is stealthed remove 80% turn meter and lose stealth.

Lurking Threat.abilityDesc: Stealthed allies have +32.5% offense.  In addition, whenever an enemy reinforces, the Scimitar inflicts Target Lock on them for 2 turns.

Slip Through.abilityDesc: Target ally gains Protection Up (50%) and Retribution for 2 turns and all other allies gain stealth for 2 turns.

Rotating Twin Blaster Cannons.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy with a 55% chance each to damage them a second and third time.  Each hit has a 55% chance to inflict Target Lock for 2 turns, but hits after the first deal 75% less damage.  Target Lock:  Gain 20% turn meter on each critical hit.

Seismic Charge.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to all enemies, plus bonus damage equal to 30% of their maximum health.  This attack ignores armor and protection.  This ability starts on cooldown.

Proton Torpedoes.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy and all Target Locked enemies, and inflict Ability Block for 1 turn on all affected targets.

Air Superiority.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy.  If attacking out of turn also inflict Target Lock for 2 turns.

Wings of the Republic.abilityDesc: Whenever a buffed enemy starts their turn, Sun Fac's Genosian Starfighter gains 25% turn meter, 40% defense and taunt until the end of that enemy's turn.

Prime Target.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy.  If the target is buffed also stun them for 1 turn.

Deadly Accuracy.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy and inflict Target Lock for 2 turns.  This attack can't be resisted for evaded.  Target Lock: Inflict 2 Damage over Time effects for 3 turns.

Advanced Targeting System.abilityDesc: Target Locked enemies have -20% tenacity and immediately regain Target Lock for 2 turns whenever Target Lock expires on them.  In addition, Empire allies gain 10% turn meter whenever they attack a Target Locked enemy.

I Have You Now.abilityDesc: Inflict Evasion Down and Ability Block on target enemy for 2 turns then gain 25% turn meter for each debuff on that enemy.  Target Lock:  Dispel all buffs and remove 100% turn meter.

Defensive Battery.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy and inflict Offense Down for 1 turn if that enemy has no debuffs.  This effect can't be resisted by Rebels.

Grim Voyage.abilityDesc: The enemy Capital Ship loses 35% turn meter whenever any ship is defeated.

Heavy Interference.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy and dispel all buffs from them.  If that enemy had no buffs, increase their cooldowns by 1 and remove 50% turn meter.  These effects can't be resisted.  If this attack removes any turn meter it deals 1% more damage for each 1% turn meter removed.

Imperial Support.abilityDesc: ITE Reaper and target ally gain Defense Up and Protection Up (30%) for 2 turns.  If that ally is Empire, they receive an additional 20% Protection Up.

Disruptive Advance.abilityDesc: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and Stun them for 1 turn if they have more than 50% Turn Meter. Otherwise, gain Advantage for 2 turns.

Overwhelming Advantage.abilityDesc: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. If the TIE silencer has Advantage, this attack deals 75% more damage. If this attack defeats an enemy, gain 20% Turn Meter and Foresight for 2 turns.

Frenzied Rage.abilityDesc: Each time the TIE silencer is damaged or damages a Target Locked enemy, it gains +10 Speed and +10% Offense (stacking) until the end of the encounter.

Plasma Weapons.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy with a 100% chance to inflict Offense Down and Defense Down for 2 turns.  Target Lock: Dispel all positive status effects on target.

Reckless Piloting.abilityDesc: Whenever Umbaran Starfighter attacks it gains 20% turn meter and the target gains 25% turn meter.

Umbaran Missle Pods.abilityDesc: Inflict Target Lock for 2 turns on target enemy (can't be resisted), then deal physical damage to each Target Locked enemy.  This attack deals +20% damage for each Target Locked enemy.

KX9 Laser Cannons.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy.  In addition, inflict 2 Damage Over Time effects for 2 turns on a critical hit.

Lead The Way.abilityDesc: Wedge's X-Wing gains 25% turn meter whenever it attacks out of turn.

Eyes On The Breach.abilityDesc: Deal physical damage to target enemy.  Deals 10% additonal damage for each detrimental effect on the target.  Target Lock: Inflict 3 Damage Over Time effects for 2 turns.
